page.title: 18Transport
page.content: {1.ROAD.}Around{Runcorn}there is the expressway which is shaped in a figure of eight centred on the Shopping City complex.It is a dual carrage way which takes more cars more quickly than normal roads.It also keeps most of the traffic out of the town centre which is largely pedestrianised_the only vehicles being allowed in being buses which run on special busways.The nearest motorway links are the M56 and the M63.The M56 links Runcorn with Chester,North Wales and Manchester while the M63 links with the M6 and Liverpool. . {2.RAIL.}Runcorn is on the main line electrified link between Liverpool and London it also has diesel rail links with Manchester and Chester.There is also a goods line linking ICI Weston Point to the main line.
